scripts.start:all: npm run start:parent | npm run start:header | npm run start:list | npm run start:details | npm run start:similar | npm run start:selection | npm run start:selection
scripts.build: npm run build:parent && npm run build:mfe
scripts.build:mfe: npm run build:header && npm run build:details && npm run build:list && npm run build:selection && npm run build:similar
scripts.build:header: ng build --project header --single-bundle --output-hashing none --vendor-chunk false && node build-elements.js header
scripts.build:details: ng build --project details --single-bundle --output-hashing none --vendor-chunk false && node build-elements.js details
scripts.build:list: ng build --project list --single-bundle --output-hashing none --vendor-chunk false && node build-elements.js list
scripts.build:selection: ng build --project selection --single-bundle --output-hashing none --vendor-chunk false && node build-elements.js selection
scripts.build:similar: ng build --project similar --single-bundle --output-hashing none --vendor-chunk false && node build-elements.js similar
